attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People profiteering from selling concert tickets help no one but themselves and they often don't have to leave their own house to make thousands of pounds a month. In doing so they make everything more expensive for the rest of us! We're fed up with people touting tickets within hours of concerts going on sale. How can they appear on internet auction sites at vastly inflated rates when it is obvious they have been purely bought for profit, depriving real concert goers of tickets at face value prices. Please make it illegal to resell tickets on online auction sites and make the rules more stringent for online ticket agents...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
